kolambaa maha nagara sabhawe aarakshaka niyamakayin bandawa ganime sammukha parikshana mandalaye samajikayaku lesa katayuthu kala niladhariyaku sabhawe bandawa ganime paripatiyata patahaniwa adhyapana sudusukam sapura nomathi illumkaruwanta pathwim di athi bawa penwa dena nagarika manthriwaru memangin wishala dushanayak sidu wi athi bawa awadharanaya karayi.mema niladhariya paripalana niladhari thanathurata amatharawa nagaradhipathiwaraya danata wisuruwa hara athi hadisi watalim anshaye wadabalana pradhani thanathurada nagarika departhamenthuwe bandawa ganime niladhariya lesada thanathuru thunak darana bawada emangin wancha dushana rasak siduwa athayida manthriwaru penwa dethi.mema niladhariyata erehiwa piyawara gatha yuthu bawa pasugiya kolambaa maha nagara sabha masika raswimedi eekamathika thiranayakata pamini bawada ee anuwa basnahira palath aandukara alewi mawlana mahatha wethath basnahira palath wiganana anshaya wethath basnahira palath maha amathiwaraya wethath likhithawa danum dun bawada owuhu kiyathi.nagarika manthriwarun wana erik chandrasena (e.ja.ni.sa.) royi bogahawaththa (swadhina) saha mahendra darshana silwa (e.ja.pa.) yana mahathwaru me pilibanda adahas dakwiya.kolambaa nagara sabhawe dushitha niladhariyek rakina bawata manthriwaru nangana chodanawa sathyadayi nagarika komasaris bhadrani jayawardhana mahathmiyagen dinamina wimasimak kalaya.
